results.name: Dailydivs Network
results.description: Daily Divs Network, or DDN, is an open source, hon
results.fullDescription: Daily Divs Network, or DDN, is an open source, honest and mathematically verifiable Ethereum smart contract. On a simple level, the contract is responsible for giving out a certain amount of DDN tokens to whoever gives ETH to it. On top of this, it can also give out ETH should you want to sell your DDN back to the contract. Both of these things are done in such a way that if completely liquidated, every single wei (the smallest unit of ETH) can always be accounted for and paid back.

results.fullDescription: 【GENE A.I.dols】is a blockchain-based entertainment similar to the well-known blockchain game "CryptoKitties". You can create, raise, and debut pop stars called "A.I.dols". This new type of entertainment enables you to create world's one and only"A.I.dols" by writing down an artificial gene of the pop star's appearance generated by AI technologies on the blockchain. So, every A.I.dol is unique, with its own set of traits. When you generate two "A.I.dols" , you can also create a new A.I.dol similar to the two A.I.dols by fusion. Or you can teach on communication as their producer. Furthermore, crypto holders can play the game using token or debut A.I.dols in the real world. Moreover, we plan to implement A.I.dols in the entertainment which non-crypto holders will also be able to play. We are sure both crypto holders and non-crypto holders will enjoy its latest technology. Latest technological development has been progressing and growing at a phenomenal speed. We hope as many people as possible feel free to enjoy and experience this cutting-edge technology from our entertainment.

results.name: Lock
results.description: Timelock your tokens in smart contracts
results.fullDescription:
Lock is a protocol for timelocking ETH and ERC-20 tokens. Choose the token to lock and the duration it will be stored in the contract. Then just confirm the transaction. Once the timelock is complete, you (or a designated beneficiary) will be able to claim the tokens.

There are four primary use cases for Lock:

  • Hold (HODL) - Protect yourself from yourself. The Hold use case of Lock enables users to store their assets and make sure that they cannot be sold for a certain duration of time.
  • Vest - Lock up team or investor tokens Whether you are a founder or an employee, vest makes storing tokens easy.
  • Yield Farming and Staking Programs - Incentivize your token holders to lock tokens on the platform and reward them with customized airdrops
  • Earn - Make money while storing money. Earn interest and fees through locking tokens from other protocols like Compound or Uniswap.
  • Distribute - Programmatic payouts enable future payouts to occur to the same account or a different one at any date and frequency.

results.name: Cardma
results.description: Cardma makes it easy to send and receive e-cards a
results.fullDescription: Cardma makes it easy to send and receive e-cards and ETH gifts on blockchain. Each artist designed e-card sent are in the form of ERC-721 tokens. Combined with the personal messages written on the cards, each card is truly unique and means a lot to its owner. When you create a card on Cardma, an ERC-721 token, as well as the gift amount, is stored on Cardma contract. The receiver then uses the corresponding private key to claim the card and gift from the contract. This means that the receiver does not have to have a wallet before receiving the gift and the sender does not have to get the receiver's address beforehand. Such mechanism brings back the element of surprise to gift-sending on blockchain!

results.name: PIXBY
results.description: PIXBY smart contract uses the concept of Cryptocur
results.fullDescription: PIXBY smart contract uses the concept of Cryptocurrency staking, which can be described as holding interest over some amount of money fixed in your bank account. In this case, the coins are locked in a smart contract for a period of time for a daily-based reward in return. EFFECTIVE STAKING YIELD The staking reward calculation is 23% of the annual ROI. For instance, if you stake 2,000,000 PIXBY tokens for 365 days, you will be able to claim 1260.273 PIXBY on a daily basis.

results.name: DeFi Saver
results.description: DeFi Saver is a one-stop management app for decentralized finance protocols.
results.fullDescription:
DeFi Saver is an advanced management app for decentralized finance protocols, focused on creating, managing, and tracking leveraged positions with unique automated asset management and liquidation protection features.

DeFi Saver provides a broad set of features like portfolio management, lending and borrowing, asset swapping, loan refinancing, and building custom transactions with support for MakerDAO, Compound, Aave, Reflexer, dYdX, Uniswap, Kyber, Curve, Balancer, and other popular protocols and decentralized exchanges.

The asset management application is currently compatible with wallets like MetaMask, Ledger, Trezor, Fortmatic, Coinbase Wallet, Trust Wallet, and WalletConnect among others.

Some of the core features of DeFi Saver include:

  • Boost & Repay: Allows users to easily increase the position size or reduce debt in a single, seamless transaction.
  • Automation: Set automated liquidation protection or leverage increases at specific prices and ratios.
  • Smart Savings: Quick access to the best lending interest rates across DeFi protocols.
  • Loan Shifter: Refinancing tool providing an instant and simple way to change collateral or debt asset and shift between protocols.
  • Custom Transaction Builder: Combine a number of actions, such as flash loans, asset swaps, and other DeFi protocol interactions into a single transaction.
  • Simulation Mode: Allows users to experiment and test all the features of DeFi Saver without having to pay any fees or spend any funds at all by creating a separate test environment.

results.name: Cypher Bank
results.description: To buy CBT, simply click the "Buy Tokens&quot
results.fullDescription: To buy CBT, simply click the "Buy Tokens" button and enter the amount of Ether you want to convert to CBT, based on the current Buy Price. When confirming the transaction on MetaMask, be sure to use a high enough gas price so that the price doesn't change drastically while the transaction is in progress. . Buying coins will increase both the Buy Price and Sell Price with 0.00000001 ETH per bought coin once the transaction is complete.

STDEX is a token, based on the Ethereum blockchain technology. STDEX is our platform currency for all services provided by fineTOKEN OÜ including investinTOKENS.com, stableDEX.io decentralized exchange, CoinMarketAlert.com, and fineTOKENpay.com. STDEX can be used to pay fees and held to earn rewards in STDEX. FineToken OÜ is the provider of the services offered on the website stabledex.io. FineToken OÜ is licensed by the Estonian FIU for providing services to exchange virtual currency against fiat currency (Licence number FVR000995) and providing virtual currency wallet services (Licence number FRK000887).
